entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as being deafened by the crash of rock and the dragon's roars. He is clinging to the dragon's back, expecting to be shaken off at any moment.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as yelling 'Defodio!' while helping the dragon enlarge the passageway.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as copying Hermione's spell to blast the ceiling apart.
